text: @BBCPanorama 👉🏿Did you watch @BBCPanorama? It's a must RT There were no gowns, visors, swabs or body bags in the govt's pandemic stockpile when #Covid19 reached the UK, Panorama uncovered. The gov said it has taken the right steps & is doing everything it can to increase stocks #WhereIsBoris
